Wow Sonny Chiba was the guest this year.
I drove through Fukushima in August and saw the poster of Aizu-han Festival.
The nearest highway rest area from Aizu sells "Okita Souji Hello Kitty"
goods.
How about Saito Hajime Hello Kitty?



Shikisoku

2006/10/2, secretary <secretarytocapt3@...>:
>
>   Every year around this time in Aizu Wakamatu City in Fukushima
> Prefecture there is a memorial for Fujita Goro who died on September
> 28, 1915. The family even over time has become more "public".
>
> Here is a new pic
> http://www.aizu.com/shinsengumi/archives/2006/10/post_194.html
>
> Photo at the Fujita family grave (where ashes are stored).
> Left is the president of the Hino Shinsengumi Club. The far right is
> the president of the Aizu Shinsengumi Club. The middle is a
> descendent of Fujita Goro through his second son Tsuyoshi. If any one
> can help double check the Japanese I'd appreciate it.
>
> http://www.aizu.com/shinsengumi has cosplay pics from the fall festival
> --------------------------------
> http://www.samuraidvd.com
> merlin@... <merlin%40samuraidvd.com>
>
> is now selling "I WANT TO DIE A SAMURAI" SHINSENGUMI
> SHIMATSUKI/CHRONICLES one of the finer classic Shinsengumi films
> starring Tomisaburo Wakayama as Kondou directed by Kenji Misumi
> Also, Okita in this film is very very interesting, he has a dark side
> but you have to watch for it....I especially liked Hijikata's fake
> tears after the mysterious death of SErizawa Kamo. Basically, I think
> the presence of the outstanding actor Raizo Ichikawa as the main
> character makes this a must view film.
>
> Note: THIS IS NOT THE TOSHIRO MIFUNE FILM (which was not as good)
> --------------------------------
> Need Shinsengumi Pop-Culture News?
> http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com
>
>
